name: Starfleet
description:
The action takes place in the second half of the 21st century, and this time not in the interstellar distance, but in the solar system. Here is the first war for the solar system between the Alliance and the Coalition. The coalition is absolute monsters and war criminals, mercilessly destroying the captives and peaceful population of the occupied territories. The attempt at peace talks on Mars turns out to be the cunning plan of the Coalition in order to divert the forces of the Alliance and deliver a crushing blow to the military base of Portsmouth.
You will have to choose your side of the conflict and lead it to victory over your opponent.
